name: Saksh WP Hotel Booking Lite
author: susheelhbti

sections.description:
shortcodes [SakshRoomSearch] using you can print the form where serarch form will display

shortcode [SakshRoomBooking] using this you list all available rooms
Search Room availablitbiy
Fully integrated with woocommerce
Sell with offer coupon
Unlimited payment gateway using woocommerce checkout processing
Calander based admin reports

Key Features

£ Small plugin thus put less load on the wordpress installation

Key Usage :

You can start rooms selling from your site and monetize your website.
sections.installation:
1. Download and extract to wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. “Dashboard”->”Settings”->”Saksh WP Hotel Booking Lite”
  4. After activation one course content type will start showing.

short_description: Saksh WP Hotel Booking Lite is a booking plugin which offer way to sells hotel rooms using woocommerce and caputre online payment.
